article_title: Jon Stewart Mocks Obamacare's Web Site Issues, Which Are Totally Just As Bad As Republicans Shutting Down The Government
article_text: After a full week of taking Republicans to task for the government shutdown, Jon Stewart made a heroic effort on Monday to mock the other side by slamming Obamacare's implementation problems. The only hitch was, it's hard to make bandwidth issues and long hold times sound as bad as taking the country's economy hostage until you get your way.

article_summary:
After a full week of taking Republicans to task for the government shutdown, Jon Stewart made a heroic effort on Monday to mock the other side by slamming Obamacare's implementation problems.
The only hitch was, it's hard to make bandwidth issues and long hold times sound as bad as taking the country's economy hostage until you get your way.
